long_description:
This is a mod that aims to do a little realism into cutting trees.
It offers a "super" variant to all common axes (at least those found in the Asuna game).

This super axe functions like this:
Once it detects that you're trying to chop a "tree", it does a breath first search from the level you dig at to wherever it can reach.   All found items are added to a stack and then it begins chopping from the top down again.  Each chop wears the axe as a normal one would, so it's best to find a better axe to turn into a super axe.

The super axe can be created by combining an axe with a star fragment from the astralcraft mod. (this is also included in the Asuna game).  The resulting axe will have the durability of the axe used in the combination.
name: super_axe
title: Super Axe
